TopicTitle: Modding Mondays: Green Skull Inc. Custom Design Spacesuits

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n3brsdqCLQ1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/6161e266c892bdcf40dcfecb23ae3942/tumblr_inline_n3c36coYS11rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>While out in space, there are times where a regular spacesuit just won’t do. That’s where <strong>Green Skull’</strong>s <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72115-0-23-Green-Skull-Inc-Custom-Design-Spacesuits-v0-37-22-03-14"><strong>Custom Design Spacesuits</strong></a> come in. Completely customize the look of your Kerbonaut’s spacesuit with over 250 textures, including complete looks and patches inspired by famous real world missions, as well as those seen in notable works of fiction.</p>

<p>Click <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72115-0-23-Green-Skull-Inc-Custom-Design-Spacesuits-v0-37-22-03-14"><strong>HERE</strong></a> for more info on <strong>Green Skull Inc. Custom Design Spacesuits</strong>.</p>

<p></p>
These are very nice. I like them a lot. Horray for Modding Tuesdays!
Wow, those are awesome. I've been looking around for this mod for a while. Downloading.
I would like to see the Dev notes earlier today. Usually it comes at 1am on Wednesday (in the UK).
Time zones. They're in Mexico, so for them, it's still thursday.
looks cool, but dark colored space suits would be a very bad idea (in real)

I would like to say Thank You to Squad for making a truly amazing game. Nothing can match Kerbal Space Programme for its creativity and addictive learning. Sure you can build stuff in minecraft or the sims. There are other space sims. Other games may have better graphics or budgets. No other game has taught me more about real life space programmes or vehicle construction and compositon. No other game has inspired me to learn how to make parts or tweak the game to how I want it.

For these and many other reasons I salute the team at Squad. This game is a fine achievement and an inspiration to many!
A Z-1 styled suit would make my day. *wink*

Yeah, full ACK. Incredible game...

I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR SOMETHING LIKE THIS!

Thank You!!!
Time zones. They're in Mexico, so for them, it's still thursday.

what planet is that timezone on o_o

o_o Yeah mexico isn't that different...

Im in the same time zone as Squad and half of the time the daily updates dont come out til the day after. I find this kind of unprofessional. But its not a huge deal or anything, just a little thing.

Back on topic:

I havent used that specific custom spacesuit pack, but texture replacer that it comes with is AWESOME!
